description: Transport Canada has a requirement for the service of administration, operation and maintenance of the Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport located at 1550 Rte de l'Aéroport, Havre-Saint-Pierre, QC.
duration_in_months: There is a 1 year contract with the option of 4 more years
full_summary:
=====================================

### Operation of Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport

**Reference Number:** cb-792-6823477

**Solicitation Number:** T8080-240089

**Publication Date:** May 27, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** July 09, 2024 @ 2:00 PM (EST)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category:** SRV - Service

**Summary:**

Transport Canada invites qualified service providers to submit a Proposal for the administration, operation, and maintenance of the Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport, located in Quebec, Canada. The proposed contract period will be for one year with four option years for a total potential period of up to five years.

**Key Details:**

* **Service Required:** Administration, operation, and maintenance of the Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport.
* **Contract Period:** One year with four option years for a total potential period of up to five years.
* **Location:** Havre-Saint-Pierre, Quebec, Canada.
* **Contact Information:** Fanie Charron, Transport Canada, telephone (343) 574-8173, email fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca.

**Amendment Notice:**

Amendment 001 has been issued to address questions from potential bidders. A copy of the amendment can be found in the tender package document T8080-240089 - Q & A's #1.

**Tender Package:**

A comprehensive tender package can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website. Please ensure you review all the documents carefully before submitting your proposal.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

Proposals will be evaluated based on a combined scoring system consisting of Technical Merit (70%) and Price (30%). A complete evaluation criteria document is available in the tender package.

**How to Participate:**

Eligible service providers must respond in writing to this RFP by the closing date and time specified above. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Additional Information:**

Any questions or concerns must be directed to Fanie Charron, Transport Canada.
